chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (k : K) (xs : list op), acknowledged_op k xs -> In (O k) xs

Premises:
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
acknowledged_op = fun (k : K) (trace : list op) => In (O k) trace : K -> list op -> Prop Arguments acknowledged_op _ _%list_scope
acknowledged_op_dec : forall (k : K) (tr : list op), {acknowledged_op k tr} + {~ acknowledged_op k tr}
op_equiv_ack_op_lr : forall xs ys : list op, op_equivalent xs ys -> forall k : K, acknowledged_op k xs -> acknowledged_op k ys
op_equiv_ack_op_rl : forall xs ys : list op, op_equivalent xs ys -> forall k : K, acknowledged_op k ys -> acknowledged_op k xs
remove_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> remove A_eq_dec x xs = xs
remove_length_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), In x xs -> NoDup xs -> S (length (remove A_eq_dec x xs)) = length xs
dedup_app : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs ys : list A), (forall x y : A, In x xs -> In y ys -> x <> y) -> dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys) = dedup A_eq_dec xs ++ dedup A_eq_dec ys
remove_length_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> length (remove A_eq_dec x xs) = length xs
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops : list op -> list IR -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out) | AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out | AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out ->...-> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out) Arguments acknowledge_all_ops (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IU _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_I_dorp _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IO _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_O _ (_ _)%list_scope
dedup_not_in_cons : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> x :: dedup A_eq_dec xs = dedup A_eq_dec (x :: xs)
acknowledge_all_ops_ind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) -> forall (l : list op) (l0 : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l l0 -> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_sind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) -> forall (l : list op) (l0 : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l l0 -> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_func_target_nil : forall l : list op, (forall k : K, ~ In (O k) l) -> acknowledge_all_ops_func l [] = []
remove_preserve : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (xs : list A), x <> y -> In y xs -> In y (remove A_eq_dec x xs)
in_remove : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (xs : list A), In y (remove A_eq_dec x xs) -> In y xs
subset_length : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall xs ys : list A, NoDup xs -> (forall x : A, In x xs -> In x ys) -> length ys >= length xs
in_dedup_was_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (x : A), In x (dedup A_eq_dec xs) -> In x xs
dedup_In : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), In x xs -> In x (dedup A_eq_dec xs)
remove_length_lt : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (xs : list A) (eq_dec : forall x0 y : A, {x0 = y} + {x0 <> y}), In x xs -> length xs > length (remove eq_dec x xs)
AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out
filter_except_one : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (f g : A -> bool) (x : A) (xs : list A), (forall y : A, In y xs -> x <> y -> f y = g y) -> g x = false -> filter f (remove A_eq_dec x xs) = filter g xs
AAO_O : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)
AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)
before_remove_all_if : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (l xs : list A), before x y l -> ~ In x xs -> before x y (remove_all A_eq_dec xs l)
op_equiv_move : forall (x y : op) (xs ys : list op), good_op_move x y -> op_equivalent xs ys -> op_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)
remove_length_ge : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> length (remove A_eq_dec x xs) >= length xs - 1
not_in_assoc : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (k : K) (l : list (K * V)), ~ In k (map fst l) -> assoc K_eq_dec l k = None
AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)
remove_NoDup : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> NoDup (remove A_eq_dec x xs)
op_equivalent_ind : forall P : list op -> list op -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (x : op) (xs ys : list op), op_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: xs) (x :: ys)) -> (forall (x y : op) (xs ys : list op), good_op_move x y -> op_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list op, op_equivalent l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> op_equivalent l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list op, op_equivalent l l0 -> P l l0
op_equivalent_sind : forall P : list op -> list op -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (x : op) (xs ys : list op), op_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: xs) (x :: ys)) -> (forall (x y : op) (xs ys : list op), good_op_move x y -> op_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list op, op_equivalent l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> op_equivalent l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list op, op_equivalent l l0 -> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_func_target_ext : forall (l : list op) (t t' : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t -> In (IRU k) t') -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t' -> In (IRU k) t) -> acknowledge_all_ops_func l t = acknowledge_all_ops_func l t'
before_head_op : forall (l : list op) (h : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) l -> before (O k1) (I k2) l -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI h :: ir)) -> forall x : op, In (I h) l -> before x (I h) l -> exists k : K, x = I k
op_equiv_cons : forall (x : op) (xs ys : list op), op_equivalent xs ys -> op_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys)
acknowledge_all_ops_was_in : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) l
Inductive op_equivalent : list op -> list op -> Prop := op_equiv_nil : op_equivalent [] [] | op_equiv_cons : forall (x : op) (xs ys : list op), op_equivalent xs ys -> op_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys) | op_equiv_move : forall (x y : op) (xs ys : list op), good_op_move x y -> op_equivalent xs ys -> op_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys) | op_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list op, op_equivalent l1 l2 -> op_equivalent l2 l3 -> op_equivalent l1 l3 Arguments op_equivalent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments op_equiv_cons _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments op_equiv_move _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments op_equiv_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ In a l
remove_length_le : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (xs : list A) (eq_dec : forall x0 y : A, {x0 = y} + {x0 <> y}), length xs >= length (remove eq_dec x xs)
acknowledge_all_ops_func_IRU_In : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR) (k : K), In (IRU k) (acknowledge_all_ops_func l ir) -> In (I k) l
In_cons_neq : forall (A : Type) (a x : A) (xs : list A), In a (x :: xs) -> a <> x -> In a xs
acknowledge_all_ops_func = fix acknowledge_all_ops_func (l : list op) (target : list IR) {struct l} : list IR := match l with | [] => [] | I k :: xs => if acknowledged_op_dec k xs then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target | O k :: xs => IRO k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target end : list op -> list IR -> list IR Arguments acknowledge_all_ops_func (_ _)%list_scope

``` 
intros k xs H. induction H.
- intros. simpl. left. reflexivity.
- intros. right. apply IHacknowledged_op.
```
